In-Memory Database Maven Plugin
Last Published: 25 Sep 2011  | Version: 1.0.0-SNAPSHOT
Maven 3 | GreenMail

Project Documentation

greenmail:run

Full name:

com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.greenmail:greenmail-maven-plugin:1.0.0-SNAPSHOT:run

Description:

Run the GreenMail mail servers.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Since version: 1.0.0.
  • Invokes the execution of the lifecycle phase test-compile prior to executing itself.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
monitorKey String 1.0.0 Key to provide when stopping the GreenMail server.
monitorPort int 1.0.0 The port to listen on for the stop command.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
daemon boolean 1.0.0 (no description)
Default value is: false.

Parameter Details

daemon:

(no description)
  • Type: boolean
  • Since: 1.0.0
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${greenmail.daemon}
  • Default: false

monitorKey:

Key to provide when stopping the GreenMail server.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 1.0.0
  • Required: Yes
  • Expression: ${greenmail.monitor.key}

monitorPort:

The port to listen on for the stop command.
  • Type: int
  • Since: 1.0.0
  • Required: Yes
  • Expression: ${greenmail.monitor.port}
